Introduction
This topic contains general information on operational performance and establishing controls, including
definition of a PAA
overview of the match
Office of Performance Analysis & Integrity (OPA&I) filtering of matches
Hines Information Technology Center (ITC) filtering of matches
PAA worksheets
PAA end product (EP)
claims jurisdiction for PAA
, and
periodic release dates for PAA
.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section C - Federal Tax Information (FTI) Match:  Post Award Audit (PAA) for Pension and Parents' Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) Beneficiaries
